katrenko.ws
Class NERService

java.lang.Object
  katrenko.ws.NERService

public class NERService
extends java.lang.Object

NERService uses LingPipe models to label the input data provided by a user. The existing models are part of LingPipe and include models trained on the newswire corpora (EN_NEWS.model) and genomics data (EN_GENOMICS.model). The former model outputs generic named entities, such as organizations, person names and locations, while the latter is used to detect biomedical entities.

Method Detail

NErecognize

public java.lang.String NErecognize(java.lang.String input_data,
                                    java.lang.String r_type,
                                    java.lang.String input_type,
                                    java.lang.String output_type)
Takes input provided by a user and outputs either the annotated input (annotated sentences) or all entities found in the input data. To carry out the named entity recognition step, one of the three models is used.

Parameters:
input_data - an absolute path to the text data
r_type - type of NER model (its value is either News or Medline (Genomics))
input_type - type of the data used (lucene if it's the output from Lucene or text if it is a plain text)
output_type - type of output (annotation if it is annotated input data, NElist for the list of named entities found in the input data)
Returns:
depending on output_type returns either annotated input_data or the list of named entities found in input_data
